evidence.claim: Dotflo utilizes AWS for their cloud services, providing scalability and reliability for health tech solutions.
The platform supports FHIR and HL7 standards for interoperability in health data exchanges.
Evidence of utilizing Google Cloud Platform for data processing and storage.
Dotflo's architecture includes data streaming capabilities, which facilitate real-time data processing.

icp.icp_reason: No specific X12 or clearinghouse references found on the site.
